headline: How Southern’s Defensive Dividend Appeal at Southern (SO) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Recently, Southern Company has drawn fresh attention as a defensive utility, with income-focused investors highlighting its long record of consistent dividend payments and regulated electricity and gas operations. This renewed focus on Southern’s perceived stability and income profile underlines its role as a core holding for investors seeking lower volatility and resilient cash flows during uncertain market conditions. We’ll now examine how Southern’s renewed appeal as a stable dividend...
